item.description:
Korean American Bio Industry Council's Monthly Seminar:

Disruptive Innovations in Medical Technology

When: May 21, 2012 | 5:30pm - 7:00pm
Where: MIT Executive Program Building, 6th Floor, 1 Broadway,

Cambridge MA 02142
Learn more and register on the Event Webpage. Pre-registration is required.

Â 

http://kabic.org/Events?eventId=489526&EventViewMode=EventDetails

We will discuss how disruptive innovations are impacting the US medical technology industry, and how Korean healthcare companies could be the leading innovators in the US market. Both large and small Korean companies focusing on medical technology industry could turn out to be some of the most competitive players in the US market in the coming decade.

If you have any questions or are interested in sponsorship opportunities, please contact admin@kabic.org
item.name: Disruptive Innovations in Medical Technology
